channel.title: The Best Show on WFMU with Tom Scharpling | WFMU
channel.description: The Best Show On WFMU is now The Best Podcast On WFMU! Join Tom Scharpling as he journeys through the treacherous and hi-larious world of open phones, bizarre fake guests, and even more disturbing real guests. The podcast is all of the Mirth and Mayhem, but none of the Music!
channel.itunes:summary: The Best Show On WFMU is now The Best Podcast On WFMU! Join Tom Scharpling as he journeys through the treacherous and hi-larious world of open phones, bizarre fake guests, and even more disturbing real guests. The podcast is all of the Mirth and Mayhem, but none of the Music!
channel.itunes:subtitle: WFMU presents a comedic wrangling of open phones and fake guests.
channel.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

image.title: The Best Show on WFMU with Tom Scharpling | WFMU
